ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 173
ygData.msgSnippet: I think that initiating in a trade will remove your invisibility.But it may be possible that being invisible will allow you to complete a quest.For instance,
ygData.messageBody:
I think that initiating in a trade will remove your invisibility.But it may
be possible that being invisible will allow you to complete a quest.For
instance, if you have the Hide skill, going hidden will change an NPCs
faction with you to indifferent.Maybe the same works with Invisibility.

Sorry if this was sent twice,
Aazen SyVex

In a message dated 11/3/99 4:34:40 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<< Has anybody else attempted to complete this quest ?
or does anyone have confirmation if quests can be completed
while invis ? pls email me directly as I dont always get the time
to read all this list mails... >>
